data.meta_site_name: Fort Worth Museum of Science and History
data.text:
WELCOME TO THE HOME OF SCIENCE AND HISTORY

Hours

Tuesday - Saturday | 10 AM - 5 PM

Sunday | Noon - 5 PM

Monday | Closed

Mexican Roots

On view now through August 18, 2024!

Sensory Saturday

Explore the Museum with modifications for those with sensory needs!

Wild Kratts: Creature Power!

Explore habitats and creature powers from September 21, 2024 through January 5, 2025!

Noble Planetarium

Join us for live and recorded shows daily!

James Hood's Beautifica

Experience a 360 journey through worlds real and imagined!

Thank You for Your Support

Your support helps us care for our collections and to develop new exhibits and experiences. Please consider helping the Museum with a donation or membership, for yourself or a loved one!
